#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;
#define F(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i <= (int)(b); i++)
#define RF(i,a,b) for(int i = (int)(a); i >= (int)(b); i--)

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
        freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
        freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
    #endif
    char S[105];
    int T,N;
    ll temp,ans;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
        scanf("%s",S);
        N = strlen(S);
        ans = 0LL;
        F(i,0,N-1)
        {
            if(S[i] >='0' && S[i] <= '9')
            {
                temp = 0LL;
                while(S[i] >= '0' && S[i] <= '9')
                {
                    temp = temp*10 + S[i] - '0';
                    i++;
                }
                ans += temp;
            }
        }
        printf("%lld\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
